products.title: It Works! Perfect Waist & Body Tape - 80"

field_description.value:
Available in "IT WORKS!" green or standard green.

When it comes to inches lost, the truth is in the tape.

Get an accurate measurement of your waist and body on your own. Simply wrap the Perfect Waist tape around your waist or other body part, secure the peg at the end into the case, and cinch. Fiberglas-coated vinyl tape is flexible and won't stretch like cotton fabric. Unique design frees up your hand to record measurements and reports measurements on both sides of tape. See illustrated instructions for more details. Available in green and "IT WORKS!" green.

Our Tape Measures are FDA Registered for Hospital/Medical use.

We can print your own logo on the case in quantities as small as 50.

Customized orders will receive a proof for approval prior to processing.

5.name: Perfect Waist & Body Tapes
5.description: Our uniquely designed Perfect Waist Tape helps you easily and accurately take waist and body circumference measurements for yourself and others. Non-stretch fiberglass fabric tape is fitted with a peg at one end. Simply loop tape around the body and place the peg into the round opening on the opposite end of the case. Then push the retract button, which always provides the same tension around the body for accuracy. Now your hands are free to record measurements. Take a look at the waist tape instructions for more details and photos.

2.name: Vinyl-coated Fiberglass Retractable Tapes
2.description: Handy and durable, retractable fiberglass fabric tapes are perfect for carrying in the pocket or purse. Each case is made from ABS high-impact plastic, which is strong, light, and cost effective. An automatic retract button on the back of the case easily retracts tape. Custom branded retractable tapes make great promotional items that will put your company name in front of your customer for many years to come!

field_description.value:
When it comes to inches lost, the Truth is in the Tape! Two colors to choose from: Green or writeable "IT WORKS!" Green

Our tape measures are FDA registered for hospital/medical use!

Our non-stretch TR-16 Tailor's Tape is 5/8 inches wide and made of flexible non-stretch vinyl-coated fiberglas with metal end pieces. Fan folded with resuable band. Inches only on one side (down to 1/16 inch), and inches and metric on the other (down to 1mm). Perfect for dieting/weight loss, sewing, and tailoring.

For custom printed tapes ("Customized" option) with your name, company, logo, etc., we can do that in quantities as little as as 250! We will send you a proof for your approval before processing your order.

1.name: Tailor's Tapes
1.description: Tailor’s tapes are flexible for easily and accurately measuring parts of the body or garments. They are ideal for use in the apparel, textile, medical, or fitness industries. All of our tailor’s tapes are made from durable, non-stretch fiberglass fabric, secured at either end with metal fastenings, and come in a variety of colors. Each is fitted with a reusable cardboard band for convenient storage. Your name and logo can appear on the tape, just select "Customized" when adding it to your cart. If you'd like a tape measure designed entirely to your specifications, see our fully customizable tailor’s tapes.

field_description.value:
Available in standard green or writeable "IT Works!" green. Our tape measures are FDA registered for hospital/medical use!

When it comes to inches lost, the truth is in the tape!

Fan folded with reusable cardboard band. Both inches and metric graduations. Perfect for dieting/weight loss, sewing, and tailoring. Won't stretch or wear out. Ships fast from Toledo, OH, USA since 1912.

We can custom print with your logo, etc. in minimum quantity of 150. Customized orders receive a proof prior to production.

1.name: Tailor's Tapes
1.description: Tailor’s tapes are flexible for easily and accurately measuring parts of the body or garments. They are ideal for use in the apparel, textile, medical, or fitness industries. All of our tailor’s tapes are made from durable, non-stretch fiberglass fabric, secured at either end with metal fastenings, and come in a variety of colors. Each is fitted with a reusable cardboard band for convenient storage. Your name and logo can appear on the tape, just select "Customized" when adding it to your cart. If you'd like a tape measure designed entirely to your specifications, see our fully customizable tailor’s tapes.
